g:HTML.p: This app is a bit of an experiment in an attempt to assist those who have a color vision deficiency. One who is color vision deficient has a decreased ability to see color, or perceive color differences. This is potentially problematic if you are trying to differentiate traffic conditions on a map based on a color scheme.
By tapping the gear icon in the upper left corner of the menu screen you have the ability to customize the colors which are used to display traffic conditions.

The app is still being worked on so if you have any questions, thoughts or suggestions on how to make it better please feel free to send an email to
Imagined Real Support.
